title: Consider having a configuration file for plugins with metadata

content.raw:
Similar to how there is a configuration file `model.config` for each model on the [model database](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/src).

This file could contain metadata about the plugin, and could be read by `PluginLoader` to offer information about the plugin before the plugin itself is loaded. Clients such as graphical interfaces (ign-gui) and websites (ign-fuel) could use this metadata to display plugin information to users.
